meanings.sent1: The maypops in the garden have beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked a ripe maypops from the vine and enjoyed its sweet taste.
meanings.sent3: The maypops plant decided to show off its vibrant blooms today.
meanings.sent4: The maypops plant in the backyard is a burst of color in the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the maypops filled the air with a delightful scent.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the maypop plant.
meanings.sent1: I collected some maypops from the vine to make a delicious jam.
meanings.sent2: The maypops were ripe and ready to be plucked from the plant.
meanings.sent3: The maypops rolled off the table and caused a fruity mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The maypops looked like little bursts of sunshine in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The sweet juice of the maypops dripped down my chin as I ate them.

meanings.sent1: The balloon maypops with a loud bang at the party.
meanings.sent2: Careful, that bubble gum maypops if you blow it too big!
meanings.sent3: The water balloon maypops unexpectedly, soaking everyone nearby.
meanings.sent4: The popcorn maypops in the microwave, filling the kitchen with a delicious smell.
meanings.sent5: The bubble maypops, creating a shower of soapy bubbles all around.
